summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Milk Delivery app with both admin and delivery person functionality. All core features are working correctly including authentication, delivery management, status updates, and reassignment functionality.
passed_tests: Admin panel - Add delivery person functionality
Admin panel - Add delivery assignment functionality
Admin panel - View delivery persons and deliveries
Delivery person login with phone number and password
Delivery person profile view with name, phone, pincode
Delivery person view deliveries grouped by date
Delivery person mark delivery as delivered with optional comments
Delivery person mark delivery as not delivered with mandatory reason selection
Delivery person view statistics and completed deliveries section
Navigation between different tabs and sections
Authentication flow and JWT token handling
Responsive UI design and user experience
